Product Description

Comfort Your Life without Pain

Qutool works on providing premium memory foam products, which makes your life healthy. All our products come with 5-years ensure and lifetimes support with 60days unconditional free return.

Memory Foam Lumbar Support Pillow

Ergonomic Designed for Back Pain Relief and Correct Posture

Why do you need a lumbar support pillow?

If you suffer from poor posture with an accentuated curve and chronic back pain, Qutool lumbar cushion is definitely recommended, especially if your routine involves extensive periods of sitting. Qutool Back Cushion helps prevent this by providing support to maintain the muscles and helping maintain proper posture, a lumbar cushion lowers the stress build-up.

Product Name: Lumbar Support Back Cushion Size: 17.32 * 16.14 * 5.11 inches Material: 100% Memory Foam Color: Black, Weight: 1.3 LB Strapï¼With Extra 11 inches Extension strap Package Included: 1 Back cushion*1 instruction for Use

ORTHOPEDIC DOCTOR RECOMMENDED

It can relieve pressure, automatically shape according to the curve of the human body, and has full support force when fitted, achieving a natural and comfortable stress-free state.

100% PREMIUM MEMORY FOAM

Qutool back cushion adopt thick, high density memory foam that can keep its shape, feel soft and comfortable and made without harmful substances.

3D Ventilated Mesh Washable Cover

The breathable cover can keep air flowing to get your back cool & dry all day long while sitting or driving.

The cover is removable, and easy to keep clean as this durable cover comes with an invisible zipper.

Suitable for all kinds of occasions

Premium Memory Foam Premium Memory Foam Premium Gel Shredded Memory Foam Bamboo Terry

Can Help With
Pain Relief Cushion for Hemorrhoid, Pregnancy, Coccyx, Bed Sores, Back, Sciatica relieve pains from Low Back, Lumbar, Tailbone, Prostate, Hip, Piriformis, Spine, Leg Pain, Backaches and Sores Adjust the height of the memory foam pillow to provide support for the neck, shoulders, back, and head back, and head Hypoallergenic and 100% waterproof to protect your mattress against perspiration, urine and fluids

Scenario
Office Chair, Computer Chair,Recliner, Car Seat, Sofa, Wheelchair Office Chair, Computer Chair,Recliner, Car Seat, Sofa, Wheelchair Perfect for back, side, and stomach sleeping positions bed room, kids room, guest room, dormitory, hotel room

[UPGRADE & UNIQUE BACK SUPPORT PILLOW]- If you spend a lot of time sitting on office chair, gaming chair and driving in car, this lumbar pillow will perfectly help you. The back support for car is designed ergonomically to relieve upper, mid and lower back pain and back tightness,supports you in achieving right posture and helps maintain a gentle curve in the spine.
[NEVER FLATTENS OUT] – Qutool lumbar support pillow for car adopts High density, thick, durable fabulous and precisely molded memory foam which insures a firm comfy fit and enhance your comfort while retaining its density. The chair pillow can provide enough supportive and more comfortable than lumbar roll or mesh back support, and can also be used as maternity pillow or as back pillow wedge during pregnancy. Ideal for drivers, teachers, students, people in a wheelchair, office workers, and elder etc.
[HOLD in PLACE] – Unlike other low quality office chair pillows on the market, the new Qutool lumbar pillow has two adjustable, upgraded straps, so no matter how you move, the back cushion will stay firmly attached to any office chair, computer chair, sofa, car seat, SUV, truck, wheelchair, recliner and bigger chairs or other home office accessories. Lumbar support pillow size: 18â(longest) x 15.5â(widest) x 4.7â(thickest)
[BREATHABLE 3D MESH COVER]- With removable and machine washable mesh cover, this wheelchair back cushion can keep air circulation well and always keep you back cool and comfortable, dry for the best experience, so sweat and moisture doesnât fill it up, suitable for all seasons.
[PERFECT GIFT FOR FESTIVAL]- Perfect for christmas,New years, birthdays, valentine’s day, mother’s day, father’s day, weddings, hallows’ day and graduations.Try it now, don’t worry. Please let us know if our lumbar pillow does not work for you for any reason.
Qutool Lumbar Support Pillow comes with a Replacement Policy. Ask for a refund or replacement if you have any quality related issues (covers, zippers, straps, etc.) or other questions, please contact us via Amazon.
